assessment_item.subject: Microbiology
assessment_item.title: 7NKFFKQ4 நுண்ணுயிரிகளை அனிமல்க்யூல்ஸ் என்று கூறியவர் யார்?
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

நுண்ணுயிரிகளை அனிமல்க்யூல்ஸ் என்று கூறியவர் யார்?

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

ஆன்டனி வான் லியூவன்ஹாக்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:2151"},{"text":"

ராபர்ட் காக்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:2152"},{"text":"

எட்வர்ட் ஜென்னர்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:2162"},{"text":"

லூயிஸ் பாய்ச்சர்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:2167"}],"questionCount":0,"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":1,"isShuffleOption":false,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"7NKFFKQ4 நுண்ணுயிரிகளை அனிமல்க்யூல்ஸ் என்று கூறியவர் யார்?","title":"7NKFFKQ4 நுண்ணுயிரிகளை அனிமல்க்யூல்ஸ் என்று கூறியவர் யார்?","board":"State (Tamil Nadu)","medium":"Tamil","gradeLevel":["Class 11"],"subject":"Microbiology","qlevel":"MEDIUM","contentType":"Resource","mimeType":"application/vnd.ekstep.ecml-archive","category":"MCQ"},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Horizontal","isShuffleOption":false,"questionCount":1},"media":[]}}
